title: Freestone™ by Peach New Media, an Abila Company, Named Top 10 Association LMS Solution by Talented Learning
text:
Abila
AUSTIN, Texas , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Peach New Media, an Abila company, announced today that Freestone™ Learning Management System was recently named one of the Top 10 Association LMS Solutions in the world by Talented Learning .
"Congratulations to Freestone for being spotlighted on our Top 10 Association LMS Solutions in the World," said John Leh , chief executive officer and lead analyst at Talented Learning. "Associations of all sizes are adopting learning technology at an accelerated rate and the Freestone platform continues to be a standout by providing a comprehensive learning management system that meets the unique needs of associations and credentialing bodies."
Talented Learning reviewed more than 100 LMSs and ranked the top association LMS solutions based on vendors with majority of revenue from associations, the solution's functional capabilities, and client success stories. According to Talented Learning, there are more than 80,000 professional associations in the U.S. providing education opportunities as a member benefit or incremental revenue stream with a significant shift to online learning programs.
Freestone™ is a learning management system that delivers comprehensive online learning programs to members through webinars and webcasts, on-demand courses, and continuing education using a sophisticated system designed to accommodate the unique needs of accredited content and learners who must maintain licenses and/or certifications. Freestone™ has strong integration capabilities with top association management systems (AMSs), and specifically with Abila netFORUM™, to provide a comprehensive experience for members and association staff.
"We are proud to be recognized as a top partner for associations providing continuing education," said Krista Endsley , chief executive officer for Abila. "The addition of Peach New Media to the Abila family has allowed us to strengthen our solutions to help associations increase engagement, add value, and generate additional revenue. We will continue to innovate as new eLearning models emerge to deliver the most personalized and comprehensive member engagement experience."
About Abila
Abila is the leading provider of software and services to associations and nonprofit organizations that help them improve decision making, execute with greater precision, increase engagement, and generate more revenue. With Abila solutions, association and nonprofit professionals can use data and personal insight to improve financial and strategic decision making, enhance member and donor engagement and value, operate more efficiently and effectively, and increase revenue to better activate their mission. Abila combines decades of industry insight with technology know-how to serve more than 8,000 customers across North America . For more information, please visit www.abila.com .
